Judul: CASE STUDY OF IMPLEMENTING RISK MANAGEMENT FOR PIPELINE PROJECT AT PT. X
Abstrak: In this case study, the author will see the flowchart of work especially in testing step from X for this  Project. After that the author will analyse project risk management of X in this late project, step-step of risk management for this project. After that, compare with the theoretical view. From the compare, we can see the step-step that X missed in this project, the lack of running the risk management project for Project.
Kata Kunci: Case study, Risk Management, Balongan, Construction, Leakage, Pipe
